trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs object is passed to event handlers for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs-objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>hendelsen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You use the LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs object to manually specify what data is returned, and how the data is sorted and paged when it is returned.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs-objektet til å angi hvilke data returneres, og hvordan dataene er sortert og sidevekslet når det returneres manuelt.

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add or remove parameters to the GroupBy, OrderBy, OrderGroupsBy, Select, and Where clauses by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til eller fjerne parametere for den GroupBy OrderBy, OrderGroupsBy, velg, programmatisk og hvor setningsdeler ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters%2A>samlinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A> property enables you to change the data object that is used for the query.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen lar deg endre dataobjektet som brukes for spørringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you assign an object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A> property, that object will be used for queries instead of the object specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du tilordner en objektet som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen objektet brukes til spørringer i stedet for objektet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property enables you to customize how returned data is sorted and paged.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A>egenskapen gjør at du kan tilpasse hvordan returnerte dataene er sortert og sidevekslet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control passes sorting and paging properties through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen databundet sender sortering og bla egenskaper i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have to manually handle sorting or paging, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> property or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du må behandle manuelt sortering eller SMS, angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>styre til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then perform the customized query for sorting or paging in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du utføre tilpasset spørringen for sortering eller bla i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> property is set to `true`, you must return a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>er satt til `true`, du må returnere en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The values that are passed from the data-bound control that determine how the data is paged and sorted.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene som er sendt fra databundet kontrollen som bestemmer hvordan dataene sidevekslet og sorteres.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameters that is used to create the Where clause.
trans-unit.target: Samling av parametere som brukes til å opprette Where setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameters that is used to create the Order By clause.
trans-unit.target: Samling av parametere som brukes til å opprette Order By-setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameters that is used to create the Group By clause.
trans-unit.target: Samling av parametere som brukes til å opprette Group By-setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameter that is used to create the clause that is used for sorting grouped data.
trans-unit.target: Samling av parameter som brukes til å opprette setningsdelen som brukes til sortering gruppert data.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameters that is used to create the Select clause.
trans-unit.target: Samling av parametere som brukes til å opprette Select-setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters*>

trans-unit.source: Gets values that determine how the data is returned.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdiene som avgjør hvordan dataene returneres.

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control passes properties to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control through the Arguments property in order to specify how paging and sorting should occur.
trans-unit.target: En databundet kontroll sender egenskapene til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen via egenskapen argumenter for å angi hvordan Bla og sortering som skal skje.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control automatically sorts or pages based on the properties from the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A>er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollerer automatisk sorterer eller sider som er basert på egenskapene fra databindingselementer-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can customize how the data is sorted and paged from a query by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> properties to `false` and then creating a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse hvordan dataene er sortert og sidevekslet fra en spørring ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A>egenskapene som skal `false` og deretter opprette et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, use the Arguments property to retrieve the sorting and paging properties from the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: I hendelsesbehandlingen, kan du bruke egenskapene argumenter til å hente sorteringen og bla fra databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Then customize the query as needed, based on the properties from the Arguments property.
trans-unit.target: Deretter tilpasse spørringen etter behov, basert på egenskapene fra egenskapen argumenter.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object is set to `true`, you must return a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>objektet er satt til `true`, du må returnere en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains values for determining how the data is returned.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder verdier for å bestemme hvordan dataene returneres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the GroupBy clause.
trans-unit.target: Henter samling av parametere som brukes til å opprette GroupBy-setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: You use the GroupByParameters property to access parameters for the GroupBy clause in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Du bruke egenskapen GroupByParameters tilgang-parameterne i GroupBy-setningsdelen i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the GroupBy clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre setningsdelen GroupBy ved å legge til eller fjerne parametere i denne samlingen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the GroupByParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object contains any parameters that you added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Som standard GroupByParameters-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>objektet inneholder ingen parametere som du har lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for the GroupBy clause.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder parametere i GroupBy-setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the OrderBy clause.
trans-unit.target: Henter samling av parametere som brukes til å opprette OrderBy-setningen.

trans-unit.source: You use the OrderByParameters property to access parameters for the OrderBy clause in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen OrderByParameters tilgang parameterne for OrderBy-setningen i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the OrderBy clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre OrderBy-setningen ved å legge til eller fjerne parametere i denne samlingen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the OrderByParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object contains any parameters that you added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Som standard OrderByParameters-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>objektet inneholder ingen parametere som du har lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property is set to `true`, parameters in the OrderByParameters collection do not have to be named.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>er satt til `true`, parametere i OrderByParameters-samlingen har ikke får navnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data will be ordered based on the sequence of the parameters in the OrderByParameters collection.
trans-unit.target: Dataene bestilles basert på rekkefølgen av parameterne i OrderByParameters-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for the OrderBy clause.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder parametere for OrderBy-setningen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the clause that specifies how grouped data is sorted.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av parametere som skal brukes til å opprette setningsdelen som angir hvordan grupperte data er sortert.

trans-unit.source: When you group data by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A> property, you can sort the grouped data by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> property to one of the properties used for grouping the data.
trans-unit.target: Når du grupperer data ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>egenskapen du kan også sortere grupperte data ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A>til en av egenskapene som brukes til å gruppere dataene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: You use the OrderGroupsByParameters property to access parameters for the Order Groups By clause in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Du bruke OrderGroupsByParameters-egenskapen til tilgang parametere for Order grupper By-setningsdel i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the Order Groups By clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre Order grupper By-setningsdelen ved å legge til eller fjerne parametere i denne samlingen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the OrderGroupsByParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object contains any parameters that you added declaratively to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Som standard OrderGroupsByParameters-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>objektet inneholder ingen parametere som du har lagt til deklarativt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A>av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for the clause that specifies how grouped data is sorted.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder parametere for setningen angir hvordan grupperte data er sortert.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data object that is used in the data query.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir dataobjekt som er brukt i dataspørringen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control applies its query expressions to the object defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen gjelder spørringsuttrykk for objektet som er definert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event, you can manually change which object is queried by setting the Result property to an object.
trans-unit.target: I et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>hendelse, kan du manuelt endre som objekt spørres ved å sette egenskapen resultatet til et objekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Result property to query an in-memory collection in the Web page, or to get the results from a LINQ query expression.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke egenskapen resultatet å spørre en i minnet-samlingen i websiden eller få resultat fra et LINQ-spørringsuttrykk.

trans-unit.source: You can set the Result property to any object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egenskapen resultatet til et objekt.

trans-unit.source: If the object does not implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control wraps the object in an object that does implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis objektet som ikke implementerer det <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>grensesnittet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen bryter objektet i et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: When the Result property is set to any value other than `null`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control does not query the object defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når resultatet-egenskapen er satt til en annen verdi enn `null`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen ikke spørre objektet som er definert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it queries the object in the Result property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet spørringer den objektet i egenskapen resultat.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the Result property to an object, do not use `null` to represent an object that does not contain any data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du har angitt egenskapen resultatet til et objekt, bruker ikke `null` å angi et objekt som ikke inneholder data.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control interprets `null` to mean that the Result property is not set, and it will create and query the object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen tolker `null` til betyr at egenskapen resultatet ikke er angitt, og den oppretter og spørring objektet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: To represent an object that does not contain data, set the Result property to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> object that does not contain any elements.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi et objekt som ikke inneholder data, egenskapen resultatet til en <xref:System.Collections.IList>eller <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>-objektet som ikke inneholder noen elementer.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing> events are not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A> property to an object, and when two additional conditions apply.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreated>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing>hendelser, ikke aktiveres når du angir programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen til et objekt, og når to flere betingelser gjelder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreating>

trans-unit.source: The conditions are that either the original values do not have to be stored in view state, or the object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A> property implements the <xref:System.Data.Linq.ITable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Betingelsene er de opprinnelige verdiene ikke trenger å lagres i visningsstatusen, eller objektet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A>egenskapen implementerer den <xref:System.Data.Linq.ITable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Data.Linq.ITable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the data for the query.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer dataene for spørringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the Select clause.
trans-unit.target: Henter samling av parametere som brukes til å opprette Select-setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: You use the SelectParameters property to access parameters for the Select clause in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen SelectParameters tilgang parameterne for Select-setningsdel i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the Select clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre Select-setningsdelen ved å legge til eller fjerne parametere i denne samlingen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the SelectParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object contains any parameters that you added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Som standard SelectParameters-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>objektet inneholder ingen parametere som du har lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for the Select clause.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder parametere for Select-setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the Where clause.
trans-unit.target: Henter samling av parametere som brukes til å opprette Where setningsdelen.

trans-unit.source: You use the WhereParameters property to access parameters for the Where clause in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen WhereParameters tilgang parameterne for Where-setningsdelen i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the Where clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre Where setningsdelen ved å legge til eller fjerne parametere i denne samlingen.

trans-unit.source: By default, the WhereParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object contains any parameters that you added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Som standard WhereParameters-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>objektet inneholder ingen parametere som du har lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When you add parameters through the WhereParameters collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object, you must either include a placeholder for the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til parametere gjennom denne WhereParameters samlingen av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>objektet, må du enten inkludere en plassholder for parameteren den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>egenskap eller sett den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you add a parameter named `ProductName` in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event, you must either set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A> property to `true` or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property to `ProductName=@ProductName`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du legger til en parameter med navnet `ProductName` i hendelsesbehandlingen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>hendelsen, må du enten opprette den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A>egenskapen `true` eller sett den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>egenskapen `ProductName=@ProductName`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for the Where clause.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder parameterne for Where setningsdelen.
